channel.title: How It Was and How It Will Be - Lex [Experimental?]
channel.description:
https://lextunes.bandcamp.com/album/how-it-was-and-how-it-will-be
It’s been a while since I released anything onto my bandcamp. This one has been a long time coming; and I’m really proud of it! Hope you guys like it too. (For those of you who don’t know I release different genres of music under different aliases)

item.title: How It Was and How It Will Be - Lex [Experimental?]
